blocking_gaps: UV handoff uses modeled/hand-chosen constants/regime splits not derived as a checked certificate
Perturbative/UV completion may accept with non-strict numeric conditions
OS reconstruction / Hamiltonian construction is asserted rather than constructively implemented

notes.intent: Prevent 'PASS' from being interpreted as a Clay-standard proof certificate.
